alert.note: Alert for St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 12:41PM EDT until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR FORT PIERCE UNTIL 245 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, St. Lucie. * WHEN...Until 245 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1240 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen in the last hour or so. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fort Pierce, Fort Pierce Inlet, White City, Fort Pierce North, Fort Pierce South, Saint Lucie Village, Saint Lucie Airport, Queens Cove, Saint Lucie, Fort Pierce Ocean Park, Surfside Park, Pepper Beach Park and Frederick Douglass Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
